name: KALSU
description: P2P file transfer directly between browsers using WebRTC

secretsFields.name: TURNSTILE_SITE_KEY
secretsFields.description: Cloudflare Turnstile site key. Get it from: https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/turnstile
